problem_text_cn: 如图所示,一条钢丝绳固定杆BC,钢丝绳与地面夹角为30°,BC高18米,则钢丝绳AC的长为()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, a wire rope fixing rod BC, the angle between the wire rope and the ground is N_0, the height of BC is N_1, then the length of the wire rope AC is ()
raw_comment: 本题考查了含30度角的直角三角形的性质:在直角三角形中,30°角所对的直角边等于斜边的一半
